other_tests.procedure_name: ERCP with sphincterotomy and CBD stone removal

other_tests.findings: Small dependent filling defects seen in the common bile duct, likely representing sludge and/or tiny stones. The gallbladder contains sludge and multiple gallstones. Diffuse gallbladder wall edema is present. There is slightly decreased gallbladder distention compared to the CT from ___
other_tests.changes_over_time: Decreased gallbladder distention compared to previous CT.
